notes.author: chorsley
notes.annotation: ABC Telecom implemented port 19 inbound port filtering. Chargen instances dropped to zero shortly afterwards.

notes._private_comment: applies to all graphs in Mirai
notes.author: atalsim
notes.annotation: Mirai data ceased to be collected by data partner

notes._private_comment: applies globally to all OpenResolver open DNS graphs
notes.author: jomalley
notes.annotation: CyberGreen switched from OpenResolver open DNS resolver data to CyberGreen-operated scan data

notes._private_comment: applies globally to all OpenResolver open SNMP graphs
notes.author: mcollins
notes.annotation: CyberGreen switched from OpenResolver open SNMP server data to CyberGreen-operated scan data

notes._private_comment: applies to graphs in country code for open DNS
notes.author: mcollins
notes.annotation: CyberGreen DNS scan encounters false positives for DNS amplification capability from various ISPs in China. Scan payload changed soon after to account for this.
